products.title: Hygge Birds Nordic Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription:
So fresh and good-natured, the hygge birds nordic blue roller blind is as scandi as the trend that its so beautifully named after. Taking the pleasure of the small things, the playful birds carry heart shapes and are decorated in sweet tones.

products.title: Nordic Blue
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure nordic blue standard vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm
 	fabric composition:polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
